title: cannot find symbol: dataSeries.getValues()
label: [Label(name="invalid")]
body:
When compiling I get errors like this one:

```
src/pl/narfsoftware/thermometer/ui/PlotFragment.java:157: error: cannot find symbol
    [javac]             if (dataSeries.getValues().length <= 1) {
    [javac]                           ^
    [javac]   symbol:   method getValues()
    [javac]   location: variable dataSeries of type GraphViewSeries
```

I tried using various versions of the [GraphView](https://github.com/jjoe64/GraphView) library without success.

title: Add a LICENSE file

title: saving data
label: [Label(name="bug")]
body:
- When ambient condition is unchecked in settings it should be automatically unregistered from data saving.
- saveAnyAmbientCondition shoud not take into account unavailabale and unchecked in settings sensors.

title: PlotFragment ux improvement
label: [Label(name="enhancement")]
body:
- When particular sensor is unavailable, appropriate message should be displayed instead of empty graph.
- If sensor is available but there is no data, instead of empty graph, view with hint about turning data save on shoud be displayed and then shifted to graph when data is being saved.

title: view for empty adapter
label: [Label(name="enhancement")]
body:
- create and set view displayed when adapter is empty (user unselected all ambient conditions in settings)
- show all ambient conditions by default (done)
